p: Candida spp. strains used during the experiments were Candida albicans ATCC 90029, Candida dubliniensis CBS 7987, Candida glabrata ATCC 2001, Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019, Candida metapsilosis ATCC 96143, Candida orthopsilosis ATCC 96139, and Candida tropicalis ATCC 13803, donated by the culture collection of the Laboratory of Medical and Molecular Mycology from the Federal University of Rio Grande do Norte (UFRN) (Natal, Brazil). The blood sample was kindly donated by the Hemocenter Dalton Cunha (Natal, Brazil).
